00030 /**
00031  * Class for the flexform section element
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element extends tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section implements tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Interface
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The name of the section
00042      */
00043     protected $_sectionName = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * An array with the flexform fields/sections
00047      */
00048     protected $_fields      = array();
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Class constructor
00052      * 
00053      * @param   string  The name of the field
00054      * @param   string  The name of the sheet
00055      * @param   string  The reference of the file with the labels for the flexform (typically: EXT:extkey/path/to/lang/file)
00056      * @return  NULL
00057      */
00058     public function __construct( $name, $sectionName, $sheetName, $langFile )
00059     {
00060         $this->_sectionName = ( string )$sectionName;
00061         parent::__construct( $name, $sheetName, $langFile );
00062     }
00063     
00064     /**
00065      * 
00066      */
00067     public function addElementXmlObject( SimpleXMLElement $el )
00068     {
00069         $name                             = $this->_name;
00070         $el->$name->type                  = $this->_fieldType;
00071         $el->$name->tx_templavoila->title = 'LLL:'
00072                                           . $this->_langFile
00073                                           . ':'
00074                                           . $this->_sheetName
00075                                           . '.'
00076                                           . $this->_sectionName
00077                                           . '.'
00078                                           . $this->_name;
00079         $subEl                            = $el->$name->addChild( 'el' );
00080         
00081         foreach( $this->_fields as $key => $value ) {
00082             
00083             $value->addFieldXmlObject( $subEl );
00084         }
00085     }
00086     
00087     /**
00088      * Adds a field to the element
00089      * 
00090      * @param   string                                          The name of the field
00091      * @param   string                                          The type of the field
00092      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field                           The flexform field object
00093      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception If the field already exists
00094      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception If the field type is invalid
00095      */
00096     public function addField( $name, $type )
00097     {
00098         // Checks if the field already exists
00099         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00100             
00101             // The field already exists
00102             throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception(
00103                 'The field \'' . $name . '\' already exists. Please use the ' . __CLASS__ . '::getField() method instead.',
00104                 tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception::EXCEPTION_FIELD_ALREADY_EXISTS
00105             );
00106         }
00107         
00108         // Checks the field type to get the field object class
00109         switch( $type ) {
00110             
00111             // Valid TYPO3 field types
00112             case 'input':
00113             case 'text':
00114             case 'check':
00115             case 'radio':
00116             case 'select':
00117             case 'group':
00118             case 'none':
00119             case 'passthrough':
00120             case 'user':
00121             case 'inline':
00122                 
00123                 // Field class
00124                 $fieldClass = 'tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_FIeld_' . ucfirst( $type );
00125                 break;
00126             
00127             // Invalid field type
00128             default:
00129                 
00130                 // Exception, as the field type is not recognized
00131                 throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception(
00132                     'The requested field type (' . $type . ') for field \'' . $name . '\' is not a valid TYPO3 flexform field.',
00133                     tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception::EXCEPTION_INVALID_FIELD_TYPE
00134                 );
00135         }
00136         
00137         // Creates the field object
00138         $this->_fields[ $name ] = new $fieldClass( $name, $this->_name, $this->_sectionName, $this->_sheetName, $this->_langFile );
00139         
00140         // Returns the field
00141         return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00142     }
00143     
00144     /**
00145      * Gets a field from the element
00146      * 
00147      * @param   string                                          The name of the field
00148      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field                           The flexform field object
00149      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception If the field does not exists
00150      */
00151     public function getField( $name )
00152     {
00153         // Checks if the field exists
00154         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00155             
00156             // Returns the field
00157             return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00158         }
00159         
00160         // No such field
00161         throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception(
00162             'The requested field does not exist (' . $name . '). You should first add it with the ' . __CLASS__ . '::addField() method.',
00163             tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_FIELD
00164         );
00165     }
00166 }
